snippet: KADISON--Rhoda, 95, daughter of Hyman and Sylvia Gechter, residing in Laguna Woods, formerly of Whitestone, NY. She was the beloved wife of Herbert for 70 years, adored mother of Eric and Jeffrey, loving grandmother and great-grandmother. Services will be in California. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KADISON--Rhoda, 95, daughter of Hyman and Sylvia Gechter, residing in Laguna Woods, formerly of Whitestone, NY. She was the beloved wife of Herbert for 70 years, adored mother of Eric and Jeffrey, loving grandmother and great-grandmother. Services will be in California. 1/3
